about_the_game:
You are browsing the trial version of 'Wishing Island', the trial version game includes the following restricted content:

  • On your island, up to a maximum of 6 'Spirits' animals will appear

  • The highest level your island store can reach is 8

Please enjoy this island for you!

About the official version of this game

One day, a towering Tree of Hope grew in the Sea of Sorrows, and at the base of this tree, an island gradually formed — our Wishing Island. In the game, you can write down your wishes, and the island's spirits will sincerely pray for them to come true.

"Some wishes are meant to be kept in the heart." If you prefer not to have your wishes constantly seen by others, you can switch your wish to Encrypted Rune.

The person who discovered this island is none other than its owner, which is you. You can summon more spirits, expand and build up the island, adding more lifestyle features such as shops, fishing, farming, and more.

Since this island exists in a different dimension, the island owner can only interact with the various things on the island through a beam of light. The spirits also use this light to feel the owner’s attention and care.

The surrounding waters are rich in resources, and the fertile soil on the island is suitable for growing a variety of crops. You can acquire these materials through fishing, farming, and shops.

As the game progresses, you'll unlock cooking and crafting features, using materials to create food and toys that the spirits love, enriching their lives. Their happiness and satisfaction will be your precious treasure, and they will pray even more fervently for your wishes.

Praying is the spirits' innate duty, but in their free time, they enjoy relaxing or playing in the world you designed for them.

Due to their differing personalities, they might form close friendships or have tense relationships when they meet by chance. You’ll need to take care of their moods, casting beams of light at the right moment to guide these little beings in solving their problems or to share in the joy and contentment of the moment!

Day after day, the spirits will climb to the treetops to continue their prayers, while the island owners will continue their lives in their own world.

In addition to meeting the spirits on the island, you can also summon them to your desktop, letting them accompany you through your busy times outside the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4570T (dual-core) / AMD® FX-Series™ FX-9590 (quad-core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 550 Ti (1 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ R9 270X (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670 (quad-core) / AMD® Ryzen™ 3 2200G (quad-core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 550 Ti (1 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ R9 270X (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: This is a "blessing" game designed to bring you good luck, combining idle mechanics, desktop pets, farming, fishing, and homebuilding. On this island born from your wishes, each adorable spirit will accompany you every day, offering sincere prayers for your heart's desires!
